cs350f20project.controller.timing

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs350f20project.controller.timing.Clock

  • public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an observer-based singleton clock for all system timing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Clock.Updater
      Defines the update task for the thread.

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public void activate()
        zzz

      • forceUpdate

        public void forceUpdate()
        Forces a manual clock tick and updates all registered listeners. This is normally called automatically by the clock timer thread, but for internal testing only, it may be called manually to trigger the clock on demand. Disable the clock first with isEnabled(boolean). zzz

      • getInstance

        public static Clock getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance of this clock. The default zzz is 50. The clock is initially disabled.
        Returns:
        this instance
